entry.title: Version 1.5.0
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Readded snow maps (note: They do now play in night time) It's recommended to disable foliage for this build Increased air infector lifespan from 30 sec to 60 sec Removed veh infector Track Mask (removing movement delay)

entry.title: Version 1.4.6
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Reverted Warlord MaxRange change Readjusted infected grizzly leash settings (it shouldnt go off on its own anymore)

entry.title: Version 1.4.5
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Carrierforms now behave like suicide grunts (needs testing) Reduced flood egg drop cooldown from 110 to 90 seconds

entry.title: Version 1.4.4
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Removed the ability to spawn units from flood eggs and carrierforms Reduced tentacle lifespan from 120 to 90 seconds, second lp cost increased by 0/20, third lp cost increased by 50/20 Infected Engineers now cost 15 supplies and 10 power less Replaced pod infectors with veh and air infectors for the leader power drop.

entry.title: Version 1.4.3
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Fixed the Abomination/Hive Commander/Uber units healing rate - this time for real AIr infectors HP doubled, lifespan reduced to 30 seconds, velocity increased by 2 Vehicle infector (the replacement for pod infectors) are no longer able to explode Infected Hog hp reduced by 25%, price decreased by 30 supplies Increased Carrierform power cost by 15 Jumppack Brutes now transform into melee combatforms Minor fixes and code cleanup Flood hero unit firing rate increased

entry.title: Version 1.4.2
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Redline 2 does now affect aircraft Replaced pod infector with vehicle infectors (needs testing, may be too strong) Decreased Spawner hp and increased DPS by 10% Increased Marine grenade velocity from 60 to 80 Reworked infected engineers (humans) Increased air infector hp, reduced lifespan Increased flood drop cooldown by 60 seconds

entry.title: Version 1.4.1
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Increased infected cannon fodder hp by 25% Added a additional 1000 HP for all spawned infection forms Removed messed up omega team jerome upgrade (Jerome) Rupture can now be selected and used to target specific units Reverted new colors (D:) Reduced Spoils gained amount (Voridus) Heat of battle does now affect heroes (Kinsano)

entry.title: Version 1.4.0
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Added decal for infected nightingale Reduced repair amount for Hive Commander Reduced infected cannon fodder hp from 526 to 295 hp Reduced Spawner hp from 12000 to 9600, increased DPS from 225 to 281 Blisterback goo does now require a upgrade Flood does now have its own Combat Repair with around half the effects

entry.title: Version 1.3.5.1
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Fixed missing infected odst icon Flood Egg does now have a "arm" time where it does reduced damage, removed the donotautoattack me flag Infected Sniper can no longer attack anything but Infantry and Mines, however it regained access to cloak and its drone Infected Nightingale does now appear in the minimap

entry.title: Version 1.3.5
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Increased Hive Commander Obstruction Radius and Warlords attack range Increased Rupture Health and Damage Increased Spawner DPS by 25%, reduced health by 25% and decreased wait time for squad spawns Swapped combat repair with boundless fury Carrier forms can now target enemies Fixed Infected Rangers being unable to attack while moving Removed Matchmaking, Campaign, Firefight and Blitz access (unsupported) Added Flood AI

entry.title: Version 1.3.4
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Reduced XP requirement for the Spawner Removed pop requirement for the pod infector drop Updated Spawner and Hive Commander icons on the minimap Added a decal for custom flood squads Added temporary audio q for custom flood squads Buffed infected rocket DPS (25 -> 42)

entry.title: Version 1.3.3
entry.markdown: [Changelog] changed infected rocket weapontype from explosive to antivehicle, squad is now T2 increased movement speed for carrierform, increased DPS from 400 to 1000 fixed missing squads in the minimap removed pop for infection forms (since you cant infect units with a full population)

entry.title: Version 1.3.2
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Buffed Spawner DPS output, changed weapontype to Hero Fixed Hive Commander responsiveness Flood does now start with 5 Cannon Fodder squads Removed bounty for infected cannon fodder and infection forms Increased selection radius for ressource pickups

entry.title: Version 1.3.1
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Updated Spawner Health/Shield stats, closer to the Hunter Captain Changed Hive Commander Damagetype, reduced pop and increased aoe for the air attack Added 2 additional Rupture tiers Swapped 2 Banished LPs Adjusted Flood "Spirit" Drop squads Nightingales are now tier 1 for Flood Blisterback gained voridus Goo ability Reduced Flood Eggs DPS Added most units to the Flood infection map Fixed infected elite rangers

entry.title: Version 1.2
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Fixed Rupture (not confirmed, ripped code from Flood Mod) Buffed Pod infector Health and DPS, reduced squad count. Added damage to the flood eggs (1500) Added slight lifesteal to spawner, added actions like garrison and gathering Increased Abomination DPS by 25%, added infection tag to shockwave attack Checked out Blisterback, there doesn't seem to be a hidden upgrade (needs more testing) Added infected cannon fodder squad

entry.title: Version 1.1
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Added a Flood themed leader Replaces Forerunner Nodes and Sentinels with a flood themed variant.

entry.title: Version 1.0
entry.summary: Texture updates, blitz skins and unit colors.
entry.markdown: [Changelog] Updated some textures Added blitz skins Revamped unit colors
